trans-unit.target: TEXT_SUBCTS501_03088_WANDERINGMINSTREL_000_000<tab>Eager to listen to my harp, are you? For what higher praise could a minstrel ask than to have as an audience the very hero who provides inspiration for his songs!
TEXT_SUBCTS501_03088_WANDERINGMINSTREL_000_001<tab>Yet I have no fresh compositions I deem fit for a champion's ears. Would that I possessed something more to amuse you...
TEXT_SUBCTS501_03088_WANDERINGMINSTREL_000_002<tab>Ah! I've been struck by the most wonderful idea! <var 1A 02 /var>You<var 1A 01 /var> shall be the author─and the subject─of your own creations!

TEXT_SUBCTS501_03088_WANDERINGMINSTREL_000_003<tab>Yes! By weaving an epic with your own endeavors, you will find yourself casting a critical eye upon past deeds. Think of such works as muses for future growth!

TEXT_SUBCTS501_03088_WANDERINGMINSTREL_000_004<tab>'Tis no difficult thing to pen a poem─the words will come of their own accord, I assure you. Simply envision the scene, and describe the memories in faithful detail.

TEXT_SUBCTS501_03088_WANDERINGMINSTREL_000_005<tab>Omit naught and add naught, and the truth shall remain. Reciting the finished piece should then serve to bring the past to vivid life in your mind's eye.

TEXT_SUBCTS501_03088_WANDERINGMINSTREL_000_006<tab>And when you look back upon events with undistracted clarity, what was hidden in chaos may now seem blindingly clear. Especially when things are uncolored by the <cough> <var 1A 02 /var>embellishments<var 1A 01 /var> I might bring to the story...
TEXT_SUBCTS501_03088_WANDERINGMINSTREL_000_007<tab>May the recording of your sagas reward you with inspiration and insight. Oh, and do return sometime and share what you have wrought!

TEXT_SUBCTS501_03088_WANDERINGMINSTREL_000_010<tab>You now have access to the <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Duty Recorder<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>, allowing you to document duties for viewing within an inn room.

TEXT_SUBCTS501_03088_WANDERINGMINSTREL_000_011<tab>Open the <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Duty Recorder<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> interface located under <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Duty<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> in the main menu, and view the help text for further details on how to use this feature.
